name: A thunderstruck leather battlesuit
data: It increases the users strength an average amount.
It increases the users dexterity ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users constitution an average amount.
It decreases the users wisdom somewhat.
It decreases the users intelligence somewhat.
It decreases the users charisma somewhat.
It has excellent armour class for its type (magnificent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration colossally.
It increases the users electric resistance superbly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
